doc.title: Unheimliche Geschichten

credit.role: Die Dirne (framing story)/Woman (ep.1)/Girlfriend (ep.2)/Wife of drunk (ep.3)/Sister of club president (ep.4)/Wife (ep.5)
Der Teufel (framing story)/Former husband (ep.1)/Murderer (ep,2)/Drunk (ep.3)/Artur Silas,detective (ep.4)/Travelling Baron (ep.5)
Der Tod (framing story)/The stranger (ep.1)/The assassin (ep.2)/Traveller (ep.3)/Club president (ep.4)/Husband (ep.5)

doc.plot: After the old-books shop closes, portraits of the Strumpet, Death, and the Devil come to life and amuse themselves by reading stories--about themselves, of course, in various guises and eras. Four of the stories are literary horror stories (one by Poe, one by R. L. Stevenson), and the last one is a comedy involving a fake haunting.
